example_en: I was surprised by the news.
I was amazed by her talent.
She was devastated by the news.
I felt miserable after the argument.
I was shocked by the accident.
I was touched by her kindness.
The story moved me to tears.
I was horrified by what I saw.
I was stunned by the news.
He feels bitter about the divorce.
example_ka: ის განქორწინების გამო მწარედ გრძნობს თავს.

example_en: She feels insecure about her looks.
example_ka: ის თავის გარეგნობასთან მიმართებაში დაუცველად გრძნობს თავს.

example_en: There was nothing malicious in his words.
He looked dejected after the loss.
I feel exhilarated after the workout.
She felt despondent about her future.
The child was sullen after punishment.
The mood was somber at the funeral.
She's in a buoyant mood today.
She looked wistful thinking of home.
He was in a pensive mood.
He became agitated during the meeting.
He was rattled by the criticism.
She remained unperturbed by the noise.
The song has a melancholic tone.
She felt listless after the illness.
I feel lethargic in hot weather.
I feel sluggish in the morning.
The spa treatment left me rejuvenated.
I feel drained after the meeting.
She became animated when talking about art.
He's in a gloomy mood today.
She's always cheerful in the morning.
The song has an upbeat rhythm.
She looked downcast after the news.
She spoke in a tender voice.
Don't be so harsh with yourself.
example_ka: შენს თავთან ასე მკაცრი ნუ იქნები.

example_en: The child is timid around strangers.
It was cowardly to run away.
The brave soldier saved many lives.
That was a daring rescue attempt.
Be cautious when crossing the street.
That was very thoughtful of you.
example_ka: ეს ძალიან გულმოდგინე იყო შენი მხრიდან.

example_en: A careless mistake cost him the job.
It's inconsiderate to be so loud.
Don't be selfish with the cookies.
Her selfless work helped many people.
He gave me a cold stare.
Children should be respectful to elders.
example_ka: ბავშვები უფროსების მიმართ პატივისცემიანი უნდა იყვნენ.

example_en: We should be tolerant of differences.
She was indignant at the unfair treatment.
example_ka: ის არაადამიანური მოპყრობის გამო აღშფოთებული იყო.
